functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"木のキャリーバッグ","color":"#B8945F","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"ただの木のキャリーバッグ。","color":"#B8945F","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"text":"27スタックほど入れられる。","color":"#B8945F","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"text":"物理法則はない模様。","color":"#B8945F","bold":true,"italic":false}']},HideFlags:7,Unbreakable:1b,CustomModelData:2147483647,LightStarTags:{group:CarryBag,id:wood-carrybag,items:[]}}
